abstract: The devices have been linked to serious injuries in women, including infections, pain and other complications.
snippet: The devices have been linked to serious injuries in women, including infections, pain and other complications.
lead_paragraph: Johnson & Johnson’s Ethicon division will stop selling four types of mesh implants used to treat urinary incontinence, the company announced in a letter to judges overseeing two large groups of lawsuits filed by women who claim the devices caused serious injury.

headline.main: Johnson & Johnson Unit to Halt Urinary Implants
headline.print_headline: Johnson & Johnson Unit To Halt Urinary Implants
